articleData.blog_content:
I wish I did everything to make you happy, I wish I had taken you for a check-up at the right time.

There are no worries, dear. Maybe that is how the longevity of my stay is on this planet. And with a sudden jerk, her hands fall off his hands; her hands later get soaked up in tears because they would never lift up again.

The lady was his grandmother who was battling cancer but ultimately surrendered to it.

Around 1 million cases of cervical cancer are reported annually in India and are one of the leading causes of death in Indian women. So here is a call to every individual to reach out to their female counterparts in the group and encourage them to take cancer diagnosis tests as early as possible. The sooner the detection, the better the treatment. In fact, you should go to the hospital for a check-up of any sort of cancer?

To help people with this, govt. has made it free for its citizens to go to a hospital for the checkup of cancers in order to create awareness for the same. So what are waiting for? Grab your home keys, lock your home and rush to the nearby hospital to help you combat from the deadly malady just in case if you happen to suffer from one.
articleData.blog_headline: Knowing it exists is not enough, we need to fight against it!
